caption.p: Differences in species richness patterns across the most extreme years 1965 and 2015. PC1-3 refer to the climate related principal components, which were used to train the SDMs (for factor loadings see Supplementary Table S2 online); dTemp refers to the deviation of the annual mean temperature of a specific year relative to the median conditions 1961â€“2019. Density profiles represent the predicted potential distribution per species in different altitudes. Map projection is Lambert Conformal Conic 2SP.
